name: Parker (tomputergames)
description:
Parker Parker Parker

A little arcade-puzzler about keeping cars flowing through a car park.

How To Play

Click on a car (the pointer is a key!) to take control. Use the direction buttons (up/down/left/right) to move the selected car around the car park.

Drive a matching car into the drop-off zone to return it, and score a point.

Keep the yellow loading zone clear. If cars collide in the loading zone, it's game over!

Try and get the highest score you can!
